This is body text at 18px. It provides good readability for longer content while maintaining visual hierarchy with the headings above.

font-size: 18px

This is body text at 16px. It's a common size for web content and provides excellent readability across different devices and screen sizes.

font-size: 16px

This is smaller text at 14px. It's often used for captions, footnotes, or secondary information that should be less prominent.

font-size: 14px

This is small text at 12px. It's typically used for legal text, disclaimers, or other content that needs to be present but not prominent.
